articles.description: Liverpool began the post-Jurgen Klopp era at Anfield on Sunday, emerging 2-0 winners in boss Arne Slot's first home game in charge.
articles.title: Liverpool vs Brentford: Arne Slot begins the post-Jurgen Klopp era begins at Anfield in understated style

articles.description: Transfer spending by Premier League teams is £800m down on last summer as the window enters its final week - but why are clubs splashing out less?
articles.title: Transfer news: Premier League clubs spending down by £800m heading into final week of window

articles.description: Lando Norris says after winning the Dutch Grand Prix that it was “pretty stupid” to think about winning the world championship - but his victory has Red Bull worried.
articles.title: Dutch Grand Prix: 'Lando Norris' new found dominance alarming Red Bull'

articles.description: Real Madrid secure their first La Liga victory of the season with a hard-fought home win against Real Valladolid.
articles.title: Real Madrid 3-0 Real Valladolid: Valverde, Diaz & Endrick score for hosts

articles.description: Jakob Ingebrigtsen smashes the 3,000m world record before Armand Duplantis breaks his own pole vault world record at the Diamond League event in Silesia.
articles.title: Diamond League: Jakob Ingebrigtsen and Armand Duplantis set world records in Silesia

articles.description: Keegan Bradley holds his nerve during the final round to clinch victory in the BMW Championship at Castle Pines.
articles.title: BMW Championship: Keegan Bradley clinches victory by one stroke from Adam Scott, Sam Burns & Ludvig Aberg

articles.description: After scoring a hat-trick in Chelsea's 6-2 win at Wolves, Noni Madueke apologises for a social media post about the city of Wolverhampton.
articles.title: Noni Madueke: Chelsea winger apologises for insulting Wolverhampton in social media post

articles.description: New Zealand's Lydia Ko ends an eight-year major drought with victory at the AIG Women's Open at St Andrews.
articles.title: Lydia Ko wins Women's Open at St Andrews as Nelly Korda fades in tense finale

articles.description: British number one Jack Draper says he endured a "difficult" time after having his integrity questioned following a controversial win.
articles.title: US Open: Britain's Jack Draper on 'difficult' time after shot controversy and coach split

articles.description: England midfielder Conor Gallagher makes his Atletico Madrid debut in a comfortable 3-0 win against Girona in La Liga.
articles.title: Atletico Madrid 3-0 Girona: Conor Gallagher makes La Liga debut
